short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your tool for becoming a top voice!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The main purpose of this is TIME SAVING. Instead of staying for hours on the chair for writing content, you get the job done in minutes! Through this performance, not only saves you time (which is money), but also the quality of your content increases! (yes, even more money)

TopVoice is a content and lead generation tool for growing on LinkedIn. This extension is a secondary product, the main product is the web application TopVoice, which is currently in demo and only a limited number of users can access. In order to use this extension you have to have an account on TopVoice (this can be done thorough the web app), and login. 

This extension is very useful for better reaching out to clients through AI generated DMs and comments. The web application provides posts generation and scheduling as well. This are only the main features of our electronic services, the rest you can discover yourself and enjoy.

Note: the demo version (which is also free) may not be yet at it's best quality performance. When this note it's gone, please judge then. Tho, any feedback is very welcomed! Thank you!
